Module instructions
Package fr.project.instructions.simple

Interface Instruction

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalledLambdaInstruction, ConcatenationInstruction, FieldInstruction, FrameInstruction, IincInstruction, InstantiateLambdaInstruction, IntInstruction, InvokeDynamicInstruction, JumpInstruction, LabelInstruction, LdcInstruction, LineNumberInstruction, LookupSwitchInstruction, MethodInstruction, MultiANewArrayInstruction, NopInstruction, TableSwitchInstruction, TryCatchBlock, TryCatchBlockInstruction, TryWithResourcesInstruction, TypeInstruction, VarInstruction
public interface Instruction
An interface that represents any type of instruction of a .class file.
Author:
CHU Jonathan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void addInstruction​(Instruction instruction)
    Adds an Instruction into a Method.
    default java.lang.String getType()
    Gets the type of an Instruction.
    default boolean isAddSuppressedInvoke()
    Tests if an Instruction is a Method instruction which invoke the addSuppressed method from java.lang.Throwable.
    default boolean isAloadInstruction()
    Tests if an Instruction is an aload instruction.
    default boolean isInvokeVirtual()
    Tests if an Instruction is an invoke virtual instruction.
    default boolean isNew()
    Tests if an Instruction is a new instruction.
    default boolean isRecordInvokeInit()
    Tests if an Instruction is a record invoke init instruction.
    default boolean isTryCatchBlock()
    Tests if an Instruction is a try-catch block instruction.
    void writeInstruction​(int version, org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor mv, Instruction lastInstruction)
    Writes the Instruction according to a version into a .class file.

  • Method Details

    • writeInstruction

      void writeInstruction​(int version, org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor mv, Instruction lastInstruction)
      Writes the Instruction according to a version into a .class file.
      Parameters:
      version - - the target version of the Instruction
      mv - - the MethodVisitor attached to a .class file
      lastInstruction - - the Instruction that precedes this Instruction

    • addInstruction

      default void addInstruction​(Instruction instruction)
      Adds an Instruction into a Method.
      Parameters:
      instruction - - the instruction you want to add

    • isAloadInstruction

      default boolean isAloadInstruction()
      Tests if an Instruction is an aload instruction.
      Returns:
      true if this Instruction is an aload, false if not

    • isRecordInvokeInit

      default boolean isRecordInvokeInit()
      Tests if an Instruction is a record invoke init instruction.
      Returns:
      true if this Instruction is a record invoke init instruction, false if not

      default boolean isAddSuppressedInvoke()
